item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (995 points | 239 comments)
2. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (392 points | 175 comments)
3. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (543 points | 483 comments)
4. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (355 points | 120 comments)
5. WebMonkeys: parallel GPU programming in JavaScript (69 points | 10 comments)
6. Cuttlefish 'talk' with their arms, study reveals (44 points | 25 comments)
7. Agentic Editing in Zed (17 points | 1 comment)
8. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (79 points | 24 comments)
9. Migrating a JavaScript Project from Prettier and ESLint to BiomeJS (4 points | discuss)
10. docker2exe: Convert a Docker image to an executable (81 points | 45 comments)
11. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (466 points | 420 comments)
12. VVVVVV Source Code (310 points | 48 comments)
13. Tabular (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
14. Rage of the Oligarchs Naomi Klein: 'What They Want Is Absolutely Everything (3 points | discuss)
15. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (630 points | 605 comments)
16. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (167 points | 115 comments)
17. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (136 points | 18 comments)
18. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (87 points | 37 comments)
19. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (137 points | 199 comments)
20. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (134 points | 72 comments)
21. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (73 points | 10 comments)
22. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (375 points | 421 comments)
23. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (220 points | 111 comments)
24. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (258 points | 81 comments)
25. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (38 points | 17 comments)
26. Sandy Bridge-era motherboard gets M.2 SSD boot support 12 years after launch (4 points | 1 comment)
27. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (165 points | 105 comments)
28. Simulating, Detecting and Responding to S3 Ransomware Attacks (8 points | discuss)
29. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (104 points | 55 comments)
30. New studies offer insight into Lyme disease’s treatment, lingering symptoms (198 points | 133 comments)
